description: What is Asia? Students explore how concepts of culture, language, nation, race, and environment define Asia today and in years past and plan related projects for their Interim course. Offered annually in the fall semester. Counts toward Asian studies, Chinese, and Japanese majors and Asian studies concentration. Prerequisite: CHIN 112 or JAPAN 112 or permission of instructor; must be accepted into Asian Conversations program to register.
name: Asian Conversations I
notes: Registration for this course restricted to those students who have applied to
the Asian Conversations program and been accepted into it.
prerequisites: CHIN 112 or JAPAN 112 or permission of instructor; must be accepted into Asian Conversations program to register.
